A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I was really looking forward to see The Last Jedi after The Force Awakens was really good reboot movie. But this not only a bad movie it's also A BAD STAR WARS MOVIE. Episode 9 would have to be really impressive correction/explanation festival to make this movie make any sense. BUT I'm afraid it won't be. Some plots don't go anywhere and charecters have no reasoning behind their actions what so ever.
